properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_PLAN_SCRAP WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT PO.PLAN_NO , PO.PLAN_TITLE , MEM.USER_NICK , PS.PSCRAP_DATE FROM TB_PLAN_SCRAP PS JOIN TB_PLAN_OPTION PO ON (PS.PLAN_NO = PO.PLAN_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER MEM ON (MEM.USER_NO = PO.USER_NO) WHERE PO.STATUS = 'Y' AND PS.USER_NO = ? ORDER BY PSCRAP_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
